description: Waterproof, breathable 2.5-layer Hydratic shell jacket with mechanical stretch – HC Hydratic Trail Jacket M is a simple and practical rain jacket for everyday use that also works well on the trail. Made from recycled polyester with a pu membrane and pfc-free impregnation, it has an adjustable hood, zippered ventilation openings in the sides, and a two-way front zipper with a double placket. Comfort fit so perfect for layering, zippered hand pockets, a drawcord adjustment at the hem, reflective details on the cuffs and a printed pattern inside.
name: Fjallraven HC Hydratic Trail Jacket - Mens
